item.title: Fork Bomb - Bash Hacker Command Black Text Design
item.description: Every computer hacker should know what a fork bomb is and recognize the Bourne-again shell of this type of denial-of-service (DoS) attack. Do you agree? / A simple design showing a Bash fork bomb in a condensed bold font for hackers who love to tinker with...

item.title: Hack the Planet - Blue Design for Computer Hackers
